text: Bishop Francis Kalist is the current serving bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Meerut, India. == Early life == Kalist was born on 23 November 1957 in Ritapuram, Tamil Nadu, India. == Priesthood == On 30 December 1982, Kalist was ordained at catholic priest for the Roman Catholic Diocese of Meerut. == Episcopate == Kalist was appointed bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Meerut on 3 Dec 2008 and ordained a bishop on 8 Feb 2009 by Patrick Nair. == See also == * List of Catholic bishops of India == References == Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Catholic bishops
title: Francis Kalist
